title: Port Chicago Naval Magazine National Memorial: Safety
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Safety            Safety       Climate   The memorial site is on the waterfront. Expect high winds and varied temperatures during your visit. Please dress appropriately.  Military Base   Please remember that you are on an active military base. Do not wander off into areas that are not designated for viewing. The ranger will guide the visitors to appropriate areas and indicate what is okay to photograph.   Water and Sunblock  Guests are encouraged to wear sunblock while visiting the site. You may bring bottled water on the tour.
